doc:
Sam Kydd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Kydd 0 Samuel John Kydd (15 February 1915 – 26 March 1982) was a British actor. His best-known roles were in two major British television series of the 1960s, as the smuggler Orlando O'Connor in Crane and its sequel Orlando, and as a recurring character in Coronation Street. His first film was The Captive Heart (1946), where he played a POW. He made more films, 240, than any other British actor including 104 between 1946 and 1953. Samuel_John_Kydd ( 15_February_1915 – 26_March_1982 ) was a_British_actor . His_best-known_roles were in two_major_British_television_series of the_1960s , as the_smuggler_Orlando_O'Connor in Crane and its_sequel_Orlando , and as a_recurring_character in Coronation_Street . His_first_film was The_Captive_Heart_(_1946_) , where he played a_POW . He made more_films , 240 , than any_other_British_actor including 104 between 1946_and_1953 .
